column2: Greenlight's Einhorn exits Macy's at a loss -letter BOSTON
column3: July 26 Hedge fund manager David Einhorn told investors on Tuesday that his Greenlight Capital lost money on battered retailer Macy's Inc and exited the position roughly six months after getting in.
